comment: друзианский проповедник толпе, если поднят HieronimusNurgle

languages.text: "Познавшие благо болезни и прения, несите нашу Истину братьям и сестрам! Подобно хвори, наши верования должны разойтись повсюду, наградив праведников благими нарывами!"

"You who have been blessed with malady and putrefaction, bring our Truth to your brothers and sisters! Our beliefs must spread everywhere like a disease, rewarding the righteous with gracious abscesses!"
languages.original_text: "Познавшие благо болезни и прения, несите нашу Истину братьям и сестрам! Подобно хвори, наши верования должны разойтись повсюду, наградив праведников благими нарывами!"

traits.locale_text: "You who have been blessed with malady and putrefaction, bring our Truth to your brothers and sisters! Our beliefs must spread everywhere like a disease, rewarding the righteous with gracious abscesses!"

"You who have been blessed with malady and putrefaction, bring our Truth to your brothers and sisters! Our beliefs must spread everywhere like a disease, rewarding the righteous with gracious abscesses!"

languages.text: “你们这些被疾病与腐烂眷顾的人啊，把我们的真理带给你们的兄弟姐妹吧！让我们的信仰像疾病一样四处传播吧！让我们以仁慈的脓疮回馈那些虔诚之人吧！”
languages.original_text: "You who have been blessed with malady and putrefaction, bring our Truth to your brothers and sisters! Our beliefs must spread everywhere like a disease, rewarding the righteous with gracious abscesses!"

traits.locale_text: “你们这些被疾病与腐烂眷顾的人啊，把我们的真理带给你们的兄弟姐妹吧！让我们的信仰像疾病一样四处传播吧！让我们以仁慈的脓疮回馈那些虔诚之人吧！”

languages.text: 「病と腐敗に祝福されし者達よ、己の真実を兄弟たちに伝えよ！私たちの信念はまるで疫病のように、世界中に広めなければならない。そして、正しき者には膿瘍の恵みを授けるのだ！」
languages.original_text: "You who have been blessed with malady and putrefaction, bring our Truth to your brothers and sisters! Our beliefs must spread everywhere like a disease, rewarding the righteous with gracious abscesses!"

traits.locale_text: 「病と腐敗に祝福されし者達よ、己の真実を兄弟たちに伝えよ！私たちの信念はまるで疫病のように、世界中に広めなければならない。そして、正しき者には膿瘍の恵みを授けるのだ！」

languages.text: «¡Ustedes que han sido bendecidos con la enfermedad y la putrefacción, lleven nuestra Verdad a sus hermanos y hermanas! ¡Nuestras creencias deben extenderse por todas partes como una enfermedad, recompensando a los justos con abscesos!».
languages.original_text: "You who have been blessed with malady and putrefaction, bring our Truth to your brothers and sisters! Our beliefs must spread everywhere like a disease, rewarding the righteous with gracious abscesses!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ustedes que han sido bendecidos con la enfermedad y la putrefacción, lleven nuestra Verdad a sus hermanos y hermanas! ¡Nuestras creencias deben extenderse por todas partes como una enfermedad, recompensando a los justos con abscesos!».

languages.text: "Ihr, die Ihr mit Krankheit und Seuche gesegnet wurdet, tragt unsere Wahrheit zu Euren Brüdern und Schwestern! Unsere Glaube muss sich überall verbreiten wie eine Krankheit, er muss die Rechtschaffenen mit gnadenvollen Abszessen belohnen!"
languages.original_text: "You who have been blessed with malady and putrefaction, bring our Truth to your brothers and sisters! Our beliefs must spread everywhere like a disease, rewarding the righteous with gracious abscesses!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr, die Ihr mit Krankheit und Seuche gesegnet wurdet, tragt unsere Wahrheit zu Euren Brüdern und Schwestern! Unsere Glaube muss sich überall verbreiten wie eine Krankheit, er muss die Rechtschaffenen mit gnadenvollen Abszessen belohnen!"

languages.text: « Vous qui avez été bénis par la maladie et la putréfaction, montrez la voie de la vérité à vos frères et à vos sœurs ! Nos croyances doivent se répandre comme la peste et récompenser les justes de gracieux abcès ! »
languages.original_text: "You who have been blessed with malady and putrefaction, bring our Truth to your brothers and sisters! Our beliefs must spread everywhere like a disease, rewarding the righteous with gracious abscesses!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous qui avez été bénis par la maladie et la putréfaction, montrez la voie de la vérité à vos frères et à vos sœurs ! Nos croyances doivent se répandre comme la peste et récompenser les justes de gracieux abcès ! »

languages.text: "Hastalıkla ve kokuşmuşlukla kutsanmış olan sen, Hakikat'i kardeşlerine de ulaştır! İnancımız hastalık gibi her yere yayılmalı, inananları lütufkâr apselerle ödüllendirmeli."
languages.original_text: "You who have been blessed with malady and putrefaction, bring our Truth to your brothers and sisters! Our beliefs must spread everywhere like a disease, rewarding the righteous with gracious abscesses!"

traits.locale_text: "Hastalıkla ve kokuşmuşlukla kutsanmış olan sen, Hakikat'imizi kardeşlerine de götür! İnancımız hastalık gibi her yere yayılmalı, inananları lütufkâr apselerle ödüllendirmeli."
